purpose: Central engine that orchestrates interpretation by routing modules through the Kernel Access Layer and Interpretation Pipeline.

initialize_engine.description: Loads dependencies and prepares routing tables.

load_user_inputs.description: Captures user responses from questioning engine.

route_through_kernel_access_layer.description: Uses KAL to resolve dot-paths and load canonical kernel sections.

execute_interpretation_pipeline.description: Runs all interpretation units in pipeline order.

collect_intermediate_outputs.description: Bundles weighted motives, emotional profiles, conflict patterns, identity filters, and prediction matrices.

generate_final_profile.description: Uses narrative engine to convert prediction matrix into structured human-readable profile.

return_output.description: Returns complete profile to frontend or downstream API.

fallbacks.missing_user_input: Return incomplete profile with confidence estimate.
fallbacks.kernel_path_error: Abort sequence and issue integrity warning.
fallbacks.unit_failure: Skip unit and proceed with reduced-confidence predictions.
fallbacks.pipeline_break: Re-run pipeline with minimal viable subset.
